titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain machinery for molding or otherwise forming rubber.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description for certain machinery for molding or otherwise forming rubber; and (2) extend the temporary suspension of duty on such machines.
